name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick Query Editor and CSV Exporter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension help to append object field in Query Editor on single click into Console as well as exporter data as CSV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool/extension used to append object field in Query Editor on single click into Salesforce Console screen as well as exporter grid result as CSV.


Note : For used easily have to open developer console into Chrome Tab.
